body:
WARNING: At least one of the links in the message below goes to an IP address (e.g.
10.1.1.1), which could be malicious. To learn how to protect yourself, please go here:
http://www.lbl.gov/cyber/services/suspicious-links.html




> Unfortunately, I can't get audio working... I think it might be firewall
> on my end.
> I tried the m3u link through many browsers and through iTunes.
> No luck. Slides look interseting!


It is not your firewall. Yesterday there was a limit of listeners that 
blocked people trying to connect. Today, I get the stream, but there 
seams to be no audio signal on it... By the way, probably you should try


http://131.243.160.26:3389/listen


(no extension) which connects you directly to the audio stream, the m3u 
is a playlist pointing to the stream.


Folks be aware that the ip address is not the same anymore as it was 
yesterday, so all those having added a book-mark - get rid of it.


Cheers, Lars.
___
